meanings.definition: A diagram showing the relationships between manuscripts of a literary work.
meanings.sent1: The stemmas helped us understand how the different manuscripts were connected.
meanings.sent2: The scholar studied the stemmas to trace the origins of the ancient text.
meanings.sent3: The stemmas looked like a family tree for old books.
meanings.sent4: The intricate web of stemmas revealed the intricate history of the manuscripts.
meanings.sent5: The colorful stemmas made the manuscript relationships visually clear.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'stemma'.
meanings.sent1: We found many stemmas in the library's collection of rare books.
meanings.sent2: The professor asked the students to identify the stemmas in the text.
meanings.sent3: The stemmas on the page seemed to multiply like rabbits!
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the echoes of stemmas as the students discussed linguistics.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were overflowing with ancient stemmas, each holding a piece of history.
